properties.entry: SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#seletAllNovel() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , A.FINISHED_OR_NOT , A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A ORDER BY A.WEB_NOV_COUNT DESC

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelDetail() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A JOIN GENRE_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelallChapter() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CHAP_NUM , A.CHAP_WRITTEN_DATE , A.CHAP_READABLE , A.CHAP_PER_PRICE , A.CHAP_PER_IS_USED , A.CHAP_PER_TITLE FROM WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH A JOIN WEB_NOV_INFO B ON (A.WEB_NOV_NUM = B.WEB_NOV_NUM) JOIN WEB_NOV_CHAP_NUM C ON (A.CHAP_NUM = C.CHAP_NUM) WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM < 5 ORDER BY A.CHAP_NUM ASC

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelallChapterNotFree() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CHAP_NUM , A.CHAP_WRITTEN_DATE , A.CHAP_READABLE , A.CHAP_PER_PRICE , A.CHAP_PER_IS_USED , A.CHAP_PER_TITLE FROM WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH A JOIN WEB_NOV_INFO B ON (A.WEB_NOV_NUM = B.WEB_NOV_NUM) JOIN WEB_NOV_CHAP_NUM C ON (A.CHAP_NUM = C.CHAP_NUM) WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM > 5 ORDER BY A.CHAP_NUM ASC
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#searchWebNovelCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM WEB_NOV_CONTENT_DETAIL A WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectPerChap()*/ C.WEB_NOV_NUM , C.CHAP_NUM , C.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , C.WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , WEB_NOV_NUM , CHAP_NUM , WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CHAP_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_CONTENT_DETAIL A ORDER BY A.WEB_NOV_PAGE_NUM ASC ) B WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND B.CHAP_NUM = ? ) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#searchTitle() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A JOIN GENRE_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?

UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#incrementWebnovelCount() */ WEB_NOV_INFO A SET A.WEB_NOV_COUNT = (SELECT B.WEB_NOV_COUNT FROM WEB_NOV_INFO B WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#searchWebNovelCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM WEB_NOV_CONTENT_DETAIL A WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM WEB_NOV_INFO
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectTotalChapter() */ COUNT(*) FROM WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH WHERE WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectPerChapCoin() */ A.CHAP_PER_PRICE FROM WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH A WHERE WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND CHAP_NUM = ?
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#updateChap() */ WEB_NOV_CHAP_SEARCH A SET A.CHAP_PER_IS_USED = 'Y' WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND A.CHAP_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectAllReply() */ A.REPLY_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.REPLY_DATE , A.MEM_NUM , A.REPLY_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_REPLY A ORDER BY A.REPLY_NUM DESC

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebnovReply() */ A.REPLY_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_NUM , B.MEM_ID , A.REPLY_DATE , A.MEM_NUM , A.REPLY_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_REPLY A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.MEM_NUM = B.MEM_NUM) WHERE WEB_NOV_NUM = ? ORDER BY A.REPLY_NUM DESC

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#insertReply() */ INTO WEB_NOV_REPLY A ( REPLY_NUM , WEB_NOV_NUM , REPLY_DATE , MEM_NUM , REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_WEB_NOV_REPLY.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#replydata() */ A.REPLY_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_NUM , B.MEM_ID , A.REPLY_DATE , A.REPLY_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_REPLY A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.MEM_NUM = B.MEM_NUM) WHERE WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND B.MEM_NUM = ? ORDER BY A.REPLY_NUM DESC

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectFinishedAllNovel() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , A.FINISHED_OR_NOT , A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A WHERE A.DAY_OF_WEEK = 'ì™„' ORDER BY A.WEB_NOV_COUNT DESC
DELETE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#deleteReply() */ FROM WEB_NOV_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#replydata_delete() */ A.REPLY_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_NUM , B.MEM_ID , A.REPLY_DATE , A.REPLY_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_REPLY A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.MEM_NUM = B.MEM_NUM) WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ? AND B.MEM_NUM = ? ORDER BY A.REPLY_NUM DESC
